name: Cursed cars
description:
Oh no! All the cars have been cursed, and can only turn right!
Cursed cars is a racing game where you'll hit a lot of walls.

Accelerate - UP/space
Turn right - RIGHT/return

Music by Jonathan Bretheau
Sound effects come from Valve games

The first time all the cars hit the wall is extremely noisy! Please be careful!
I've not been able to spend a lot of time on this, so it's very basic, oops! Still, I followed the theme "One direction" of the Weekly game jam #92!
